author: craigmcc
msg: Port fix for Bugzilla #2068 to HEAD branch.

author: craigmcc
msg: Unconditionally pass the selected mapping as a request attribute under key
Action.MAPPING_KEY, even if no form bean is specified.

author: husted
msg: Working drafts of an ActivityAction and RegistryServlet to integrate Struts with the new workflow proposal.
These are early-release alpha files, but I thought I woudl get them up where others could see them.
To see these in context, download struts-simple from ( husted.com/about/struts ).
The Struts support is rudimentary. Beans and tags are being used but not ActionForwards.
